Html:
1.Can anyone tell me is it possible to set the ip address programmatically in SMTP4DEV.?

2.the mail sent using SMTP4DEV ,it will take time to reach outlook inbox,some time m not bale to see,i have downloaded and installed and m using  SmtpClient.Send(message),to send mail,which is going with out any error,but m not able to see in outlook inbox. I am using Winodws 7.

1. No

2. The whole point is that smtp4dev does not actually forward the email it receives, so it's correct that you don't see it in your outlook inbox.
